page-learning-tools-bloomtech-descriptio: Kos ɗin Bloom Tech Web3 zai koya muku dabarun da ma'aikata ke nema a injiniyoyi.
page-learning-tools-bootcamps-desc: An biya kwas na kan intanet saboda ka samu gudu, sauri.
page-learning-tools-capture-the-ether-de: Ɗauka hoton Ether wasa ne wanda zaka kwache Ethereum smart contracts da ka kuyi akan tsaro.
page-learning-tools-node-guardians-descr: Masu lura da Node wani dandamali ne na ilmantarwa wanda ke nutsar da masu haɓaka yanar gizo3 a cikin buƙatun jigo na almara don ƙware Solidity, Alkahira, Noir, da shirye-shiryen Huff.
page-learning-tools-coding-subtitle: Waɗannan kayan aikin za su taimaka muku wurin gwaji tare da Ethereum idan kun fi son ƙarin ƙwarewar ilmantarwa.
page-learning-tools-consensys-academy-de: Bootcamp na mai ƙirƙirar Ethereum na kan intanet.
page-learning-tools-cryptozombies-descri: Koyi Solidity ta gina wasan Zombin ka.
page-learning-tools-dapp-world-descripti: Tsarin yanayin haɓakawar blockchain, gami da darusa, tambayoyi, aikin hannu, da gasa na mako-mako.
page-learning-tools-documentation-desc: Kana so ka koyi? Je zuwa takardun mu don ka samu bayanin da kake so.
page-learning-tools-eth-dot-build-descri: Sandbox na ilimi don web3, gami da ja-da-saukar shirye-shirye da blocks na gina tushe.
page-learning-tools-ethernauts-descripti: Ƙarasa matakan kuse a smart contracts.
page-learning-tools-metaschool-descripti: Ka zamti mai ƙirƙiran Web3 ta hanayan ginawa da fitar da dApps.
page-learning-tools-game-tutorials: Koyarwa na wasanni masu ɗaukar hankali
page-learning-tools-game-tutorials-desc: Koyo a lokacin da kake wasa. Wanan kuyarwa saya doke ka daga fari da amfari da wasa-wasa.
page-learning-tools-meta-desc: Kayan aikin shafin intanet da koyar da dabaru don taimaka maka wajen sarrafa Ethereum.
page-learning-tools-meta-title: Kayan aiki koyo na mai ƙirƙira
page-learning-tools-atlas-description: Rubuta, gwada, kuma tura smart contracts a cikin mintoci tare da Atlas IDE.
page-learning-tools-questbook-descriptio: Koyar da kai don koyon Web 3.0 ta ginawa
page-learning-tools-remix-description: Gina, tura da gudanar da smart contracts na Ethereum da bin koyarwa tare da LearnEth plugin.
page-learning-tools-remix-description-2: Sake haɗa, Replit, ChainIDE, da Atlas ba kaɗai sandboxes ba na masu ƙirƙira zasu iya rubuta, tattara da tura smart contracts ɗin su don yin amfani da su.
page-learning-tools-replit-description: Wurin gina Ethereum da ake iya sarrafawa da sake saukewa, tare da duba matsalolli da taimakon testnet.
page-learning-tools-chainIDE-description: Fara ta kan hanyar ku akan Web3 ta hanyar rubuta smart contracts na Ethereum ta amfani da ChainIDE domin gina samfura do koyan kula da lokaci.
page-learning-tools-tenderly-description: Tenderly Sandabox shine wajen da zaka iya rubuta, zartarwa, da sake smart contract a burauza ta hanyar amfani da solidity da Javascript.
page-learning-tools-sandbox-desc: Wanan sandboxes zai baka sarari sobida ka gwada rubuta smart contracts kuma ka gane Ethereum.
page-learning-tools-speed-run-ethereum-d: Gudun Sauri na Ethereum irin saitin kalubale don gwadawa ilimi Solidity din ka da yin amfani da Scaffold-ETH
page-learning-tools-studio-description: IDE da ake gina shafin intanet inda zaku iya bin koyarwar yadda zaku ƙirƙira kuma ku gwada kwantraki na fikira, da gina musu fronted.
page-learning-tools-vyperfun-description: Koya yadda ake gina Viper da gina wa kanka wasannin Pokémon.
page-learning-tools-nftschool-descriptio: Yi bayani akan abunda ke tare da ayyukan kuɗi, ko NFTna ɓangaren fasaha.
page-learning-tools-platzi-description: Kuyi yada ake gina dapps a kan Web3 ku kuma sarrafa duka basira da ake buƙata soboda ka zama mai habakawa na blockchain.
page-learning-tools-alchemy-university-d: Bunƙasa aikin web3 dinka ta hanyar darussa, ayyuka da lamba.
alt-eth-blocks: Nuna jerin block kamar logo ɗin ETH
